data.name: Many Worlds VR
data.detailed_description:
Many Worlds VR is an immersive social VR experience set in an expanding multiverse. Create your avatar, meet new people, play mini games, build a home and explore the unique experiences found in each of the worlds.

Create your Avatar

Create a unique avatar in your wardrobe with a flexible selection of clothes, hair, accessories and infinite colour variations. Travel back to your wardrobe at any time and customise further with the new items you acquire on your adventures.

Play mini games

Find unique mini games in each world including chess, basketball, axe throwing, canons, archery, paintball, sword-fighting, fishing tournaments, farming and more. New games and experiences keep emerging as Many Worlds grow.

Explore Many Worlds

Many Worlds are open spaces you can explore at your leisure. Meet new friends, find land to build a home or venture further and find new and unique experiences in every world.

data.short_description: Many Worlds VR is an immersive social VR experience set in an expanding multiverse. Create your avatar, meet new people, play mini games, build a home and explore the unique experiences found in each of the Many Worlds.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac® High Sierra v 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560 graphics (4GB of VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
